name: Chuck Chuck
description:
This game was made as a University project by Clara Algara (general design), Andrés Pérez (programming and design) and Marta Ruiz (art). It was developed in a game jam style format around the theme "What home means to you" (Global Game Jam 2019). 

This is the story of how Chuck Chuck built his home and the friends he made along the way.

The player needs to find wood and rocks to build his home and explore the landscape as the seasons progress. You will find other animals living in this lands who you may choose to talk to and help, you may also have to build bridges to reach other areas to gather resources for your cozy home. But at the end of the day the most important thing is that you build your house to be your home.
